name: Trebleblazers
description:
Solo project made for TOJam 9 - April 25-27, 2014

A rhythm-platformer for two players.

One player must hit the arrow icons in time with the music to create sections of a scrolling level. The other player must navigate the level to collect goat coins and defeat enemies.

The more accurately the first player hits those arrows, the more favourable the generated level sections will be (e.g. more coins, less aggressive enemies).
